original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Addhānavagga
analyzed: addhā anavagga

original: 3. Ñāṇapaññāpañha
analyzed: ñāṇa paññā pañha

original: Rājā āha—
analyzed: rājā āha

original: “bhante nāgasena, yassa ñāṇaṁ uppannaṁ, tassa paññā uppannā”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena yassa ñāṇam uppanna tassa paññā uppannā ati

original: “Āma, mahārāja, yassa ñāṇaṁ uppannaṁ, tassa paññā uppannā”ti.
analyzed: āma mahā rāja yassa ñāṇam uppanna tassa paññā uppannā ati

original: “Kiṁ, bhante, yaññeva ñāṇaṁ sāyeva paññā”ti?
analyzed: kim bhante yaññā iva ñāṇam sāyā iva paññā ati

original: “Āma, mahārāja, yaññeva ñāṇaṁ sāyeva paññā”ti.
analyzed: āma mahā rāja yaññā iva ñāṇam sāyā iva paññā ati

original: “Yassa pana, bhante, taññeva ñāṇaṁ sāyeva paññā uppannā, kiṁ sammuyheyya so, udāhu na sammuyheyyā”ti?
analyzed: yassa pana bhante taññeva ñāṇam sāyā iva paññā uppannā kim sammuyheyya so udāhu na sammuyheyya ati

original: “Katthaci, mahārāja, sammuyheyya, katthaci na sammuyheyyā”ti.
analyzed: katthaci mahā rāja sammuyheyya katthaci na sammuyheyya ati

original: “Kuhiṁ, bhante, sammuyheyyā”ti?
analyzed: kuhi bhante sammuyheyya ati

original: “Aññātapubbesu vā, mahārāja, sippaṭṭhānesu, agatapubbāya vā disāya, assutapubbāya vā nāmapaññattiyā sammuyheyyā”ti.
analyzed: aññāta pubbesu vā mahā rāja sippa ṭṭhānesu a gata pubbāya vā disāya a suta pubbāya vā nāmapaññattiyā sammuyheyya ati

original: “Kuhiṁ na sammuyheyyā”ti?
analyzed: kuhim na sammuyheyya iti

original: “Yaṁ kho pana, mahārāja, tāya paññāya kataṁ ‘aniccan’ti vā ‘dukkhan’ti vā ‘anattā’ti vā, tahiṁ na sammuyheyyā”ti.
analyzed: yam kho pana mahā rāja tāya paññāya katam aniccanti vā dukkhanti vā anattā ati vā tahim na sammuyheyya ati

original: “Moho panassa, bhante, kuhiṁ gacchatī”ti?
analyzed: mohaḥ panassa bhante kuhim gacchati iti

original: “Moho kho, mahārāja, ñāṇe uppannamatte tattheva nirujjhatī”ti.
analyzed: mohaḥ kho mahā rāja ñāṇe uppanna matte tattha iva nirujjhati iti

original: “Opammaṁ karohī”ti.
analyzed: opammam karohi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, kocideva puriso andhakāragehe padīpaṁ āropeyya, tato andhakāro nirujjheyya, āloko pātubhaveyya;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kaścid eva purisaḥ andhakāra gehe padīpam āropeyya tatas andhakāraḥ nirujjheyya ālokaḥ pātubhaveyya

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, ñāṇe uppannamatte moho tattheva nirujjhatī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ñāṇe uppanna matte mohaḥ tattha eva nirujjhati iti

original: “Paññā pana, bhante, kuhiṁ gacchatī”ti?
analyzed: paññā pana bhante kuhim gacchati iti

original: “Paññāpi kho, mahārāja, sakiccayaṁ katvā tattheva nirujjhati, yaṁ pana tāya paññāya kataṁ ‘aniccan’ti vā ‘dukkhan’ti vā ‘anattā’ti vā, taṁ na nirujjhatī”ti.
analyzed: paññā api kho mahā rāja sa kiccayam katvā tattha iva nirujjhati yam pana tāya paññāya katam aniccanti vā dukkhanti vā anattā ati vā tam na nirujjhati iti

original: “Bhante nāgasena, yaṁ panetaṁ brūsi ‘paññā sakiccayaṁ katvā tattheva nirujjhati,
analyzed: bhante nāgasena yam pana itam brūsi paññā sa kiccayam katvā tattha iva nirujjhati

original: yaṁ pana tāya paññāya kataṁ “aniccan”ti vā “dukkhan”ti vā “anattā”ti vā, taṁ na nirujjhatī’ti,
analyzed: yam pana tāya paññāya katam aniccanti vā dukkhanti vā anattā ati vā tam na nirujjhati iti

original: tassa opammaṁ karohī”ti.
analyzed: tassa opammam karohi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, yo koci puriso rattiṁ lekhaṁ pesetukāmo lekhakaṁ pakkosāpetvā padīpaṁ
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja yaḥ koci purisaḥ rattim lekham pesetu kāmaḥ lekhakam pakkosāpetvā

original: āropetvā lekhaṁ likhāpeyya, likhite pana lekhe padīpaṁ vijjhāpeyya, vijjhāpitepi
analyzed: āropetvā lekham likhāpeyya likhite pana lekhe padīpam vijjhāpeyya vijjhāpite api

original: padīpe lekhaṁ na vinasseyya.
analyzed: padīpe lekham na vinasseyya

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, paññā sakiccayaṁ katvā tattheva nirujjhati, yaṁ pana tāya paññāya kataṁ ‘aniccan’ti vā ‘dukkhan’ti vā ‘anattā’ti vā, taṁ na nirujjhatī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja paññā sa kiccayam katvā tattha iva nirujjhati yam pana tāya paññāya katam aniccanti vā dukkhanti vā anattā ati vā tam na nirujjhati iti

original: “Bhiyyo opammaṁ karohī”ti.
analyzed: bhiyyas opammam karohi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, puratthimesu janapadesu manussā anugharaṁ pañca pañca udakaghaṭakāni
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja puratthimesu janapadesu manussāḥ anugharam pañca pañca udaka ghaṭakāni

original: ṭhapenti ālimpanaṁ vijjhāpetuṁ, ghare paditte tāni pañca udakaghaṭakāni gharassūpari
analyzed: ṭhapenti ālimpanam vijjhāpetu ghare paditte tāni pañca udakaghaṭakāni gharassu upari

original: khipanti, tato aggi vijjhāyati, kiṁ nu kho, mahārāja, tesaṁ manussānaṁ evaṁ hoti
analyzed: khipanti tatas aggi vijjhāyati kim nu kho mahā rāja tesam manussānam evam hoti

original: ‘puna tehi ghaṭehi ghaṭakiccaṁ karissāmā’”ti?
analyzed: puna tehi ghaṭehi ghaṭa kiccam karissāma ati

original: “Na hi, bhante, alaṁ tehi ghaṭehi, kiṁ tehi ghaṭehī”ti?
analyzed: na hi bhante alam tehi ghaṭehi kim tehi ghaṭehi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, pañca udakaghaṭakāni, evaṁ pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja pañca udaka ghaṭakāni evam pañca indriyāni daṭṭhabbāni saddhindriyam vīriyindriyam satindriyam samādhindriyam paññindriya

original: Yathā te manussā, evaṁ yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: yathā te manussāḥ evam yogāvacaraḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Yathā aggi, evaṁ kilesā daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: yathā aggi evam kilesā daṭṭhabbā

original: Yathā pañcahi udakaghaṭakehi aggi vijjhāpīyati, evaṁ pañcindriyehi kilesā vijjhāpiyanti, vijjhāpitāpi kilesā na puna sambhavanti.
analyzed: yathā pañcahi udaka ghaṭakehi aggi vijjhāpīyati evam pañca indriyehi kilesāḥ vijjhāpiyanti vijjhāpitāḥ api kilesāḥ na puna sambhavanti

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, paññā sakiccayaṁ katvā tattheva nirujjhati, yaṁ pana tāya paññāya kataṁ ‘aniccan’ti vā ‘dukkhan’ti vā ‘anattā’ti vā, taṁ na nirujjhatī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja paññā sa kiccayam katvā tattha iva nirujjhati yam pana tāya paññāya katam aniccanti vā dukkhanti vā anattā ati vā tam na nirujjhati iti

original: “Bhiyyo opammaṁ karohī”ti.
analyzed: bhiyyas opammam karohi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, vejjo pañcamūlabhesajjāni gahetvā gilānakaṁ upasaṅkamitvā tāni
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja vejjo pañca mūla bhesajjāni gahetvā gilānakam upasaṅkamitvā tāni

original: pañcamūlabhesajjāni pisitvā gilānakaṁ pāyeyya, tehi ca dosā niddhameyyuṁ, kiṁ nu
analyzed: pañcamūla bhesajjāni pisitvā gilānakam pāyeyya tehi ca dosāḥ niddhameyyu kim nu

original: kho, mahārāja, tassa vejjassa evaṁ hoti ‘puna tehi pañcamūlabhesajjehi bhesajjakiccaṁ karissāmī’”ti?
analyzed: kho mahā rāja tassa vejjassa evam hoti puna tehi pañca mūla bhesajjehi bhesajja kiccam karissāmi iti

original: “Na hi, bhante, alaṁ tehi pañcamūlabhesajjehi, kiṁ tehi pañcamūlabhesajjehī”ti?
analyzed: na hi bhante alam tehi pañcamūla bhesajjehi kim tehi pañcamūla bhesajjehi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, pañcamūlabhesajjāni, evaṁ pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ, yathā vejjo, evaṁ yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja pañca mūla bhesajjāni evam pañca indriyāni daṭṭhabbāni saddhi indriyam vīriya indriyam sati indriyam samādhi indriyam paññā indriya yathā vejjaḥ evam yogāvacaraḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Yathā byādhi, evaṁ kilesā daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: yathā byādhi evam kilesā daṭṭhabbā

original: Yathā byādhito puriso, evaṁ puthujjano daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: yathā byādhitaḥ purisaḥ evam puthujjanaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Yathā pañcamūlabhesajjehi gilānassa dosā niddhantā, dose niddhante gilāno arogo hoti, evaṁ pañcindriyehi kilesā niddhamīyanti, niddhamitā ca kilesā na puna sambhavanti.
analyzed: yathā pañca mūla bhesajjehi gilānassa dosāḥ niddhantāḥ dose niddhante gilānaḥ arogaḥ hoti evam pañca indriyehi kilesāḥ niddhamīyanti niddhamitā ca kilesāḥ na puna sambhavanti

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, paññā sakiccayaṁ katvā tattheva nirujjhati, yaṁ pana tāya paññāya kataṁ ‘aniccan’ti vā ‘dukkhan’ti vā ‘anattā’ti vā, taṁ na nirujjhatī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja paññā sa kiccayam katvā tattha iva nirujjhati yam pana tāya paññāya katam aniccanti vā dukkhanti vā anattā ati vā tam na nirujjhati iti

original: “Bhiyyo opammaṁ karohī”ti.
analyzed: bhiyyas opammam karohi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, saṅgāmāvacaro yodho pañca kaṇḍāni gahetvā saṅgāmaṁ otareyya parasenaṁ
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja saṅgāma avacaraḥ yodhaḥ pañca kaṇḍāni gahetvā saṅgāmam otareyya parasena

original: vijetuṁ, so saṅgāmagato tāni pañca kaṇḍāni khipeyya, tehi ca parasenā bhijjeyya,
analyzed: vijetu saḥ saṅgāma gataḥ tāni pañca kaṇḍāni khipeyya tehi ca para senā bhijjeyya

original: kiṁ nu kho, mahārāja, tassa saṅgāmāvacarassa yodhassa evaṁ hoti ‘puna tehi kaṇḍehi
analyzed: kim nu kho mahā rāja tassa saṅgāma avacarassa yodhassa evam hoti puna tehi kaṇḍehi

original: kaṇḍakiccaṁ karissāmī’”ti?
analyzed: kaṇḍa kiccam karissāmi iti

original: “Na hi, bhante, alaṁ tehi kaṇḍehi, kiṁ tehi kaṇḍehī”ti?
analyzed: na hi bhante alam tehi kaṇḍehi kim tehi kaṇḍehi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, pañca kaṇḍāni, evaṁ pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja pañca kaṇḍāni evam pañca indriyāni daṭṭhabbāni saddhindriyam vīriyindriyam satindriyam samādhindriyam paññindriya

original: Yathā, mahārāja, saṅgāmāvacaro yodho, evaṁ yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja saṅgāma avacaraḥ yodhaḥ evam yoga avacaraḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Yathā parasenā, evaṁ kilesā daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: yathā para senā evam kilesā daṭṭhabbā

original: Yathā pañcahi kaṇḍehi parasenā bhijjati, evaṁ pañcindriyehi kilesā bhijjanti, bhaggā ca kilesā na puna sambhavanti.
analyzed: yathā pañcahi kaṇḍehi para senā bhijjati evam pañca indriyehi kilesāḥ bhijjanti bhaggāḥ ca kilesāḥ na puna sambhavanti

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, paññā sakiccayaṁ katvā tattheva nirujjhati, yaṁ pana tāya paññāya kataṁ ‘aniccan’ti vā ‘dukkhan’ti vā ‘anattā’ti vā, taṁ na nirujjhatī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja paññā sa kiccayam katvā tattha iva nirujjhati yam pana tāya paññāya katam aniccanti vā dukkhanti vā anattā ati vā tam na nirujjhati iti

original: “Kallosi, bhante nāgasenā”ti.
analyzed: kallosi bhante nāgasena ati

original: Ñāṇapaññāpañho tatiyo.
analyzed: ñāṇa paññā pañhaḥ tatiyaḥ
